changelog: New server-side export `getPlayerLevel` added for retrieving player level.
New server-side export `getPlayerXp` added for accessing player XP.
New server-side export `getPlayerPoints` added for checking player skill points.
New server-side export `getPlayerTotalXp` added for obtaining total player XP.
New server-side export `getPlayerGlobalStats` added for accessing global player statistics.
Added missing translations to the config.
